General.Name: Holsin Engineering Consulting
General.Description: C&D Holsin Engineering Consulting Co., Ltd operates as an engineering consulting company in China. It provides engineering survey and designing, management, testing and inspection, and building construction services, as well as new engineering materials. The company also offers project life cycle management and technical consulting services. It serves transportation, municipal administration, housing construction, etc. The company was formerly known as Holsin Engineering Consulting Group Co.,Ltd. and changed its name to C&D Holsin Engineering Consulting Co., Ltd. in October 2022. C&D Holsin Engineering Consulting Co., Ltd was founded in 1995 and is based in Xiamen, China.
